mapper.select: SELECT t.tag_name FROM course_tags ct JOIN tags t ON ct.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE ct.course_id = #{course_id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM courses c JOIN users u ON c.author_id = u.id
c.type = 'COMMUNITY'
AND (c.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR c.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%'))
AND c.area = #{area}

SELECT c.course_id, c.title, c.preview_image, c.author_id AS user_id, u.nickname AS author, u.profile_image, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_likes cl WHERE cl.course_id = c.course_id) AS likes FROM courses c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.author_id = u.id WHERE c.course_id = #{id}
SELECT step_id AS id, step_type AS type, emoji, name, description, image FROM course_steps WHERE course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY step_order ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM course_likes WHERE course_id = #{courseId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO courses (author_id, title, preview_image, type) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{previewImage}, 'COMMUNITY')
INSERT INTO course_steps (course_id, step_order, name, type, time, cost) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{order}, #{name}, #{type}, #{time}, #{cost})
